# XiNiS Engine

> Professional astrology calculation API powered by Swiss Ephemeris. Natal charts, transits, progressions, and solar/lunar returns with arc-second precision.

## Documentation

- [Full API Documentation](llms-full.txt): Complete endpoint reference with request/response examples
- [Interactive API Docs](https://api.xinis.space/docs): Swagger UI
- [Source Code](https://github.com/arikusi/xinis-engine): GitHub

## API Endpoints

Base URL: https://api.xinis.space

- `POST /natal-chart` -- Natal chart with automatic timezone resolution
- `POST /transits` -- Transits to a natal chart
- `POST /progressions` -- Secondary progressions (1 day = 1 year)
- `POST /solar-return` -- Solar return chart for a given year
- `POST /lunar-return` -- Lunar return chart near a given date
- `POST /fixed-stars` -- Fixed stars positions and planet conjunctions
- `POST /export` -- Export chart as JSON, Markdown, or AI prompt
- `POST /export-fixed-stars` -- Export fixed stars data
- `GET /config` -- Available celestial bodies, aspects, and house systems
- `GET /health` -- Service health check

## Capabilities

- 10 house systems: Placidus, Whole Sign, Koch, Equal, Campanus, Regiomontanus, Porphyry, Morinus, Topocentric, Alcabitius
- 28+ celestial bodies: planets, nodes, asteroids, extended objects, calculated points
- 11 aspect types: Conjunction, Opposition, Trine, Square, Sextile, Quincunx, Semisquare, Sesquiquadrate, Semisextile, Quintile, Biquintile
- 7 aspect patterns: Grand Trine, T-Square, Grand Cross, Yod, Kite, Stellium, Mystic Rectangle
- Automatic timezone resolution from coordinates with historical DST support

## Version

1.0.0
